name: @esroyo/network-information-api-polyfill
description: A polyfill for the Network Information API with automatic and manual installation options

tasks.coverage: deno task test --clean --reporter=dot --coverage=coverage && deno coverage --lcov --output=coverage.lcov --exclude='src/test-utils.ts|vendor' coverage && genhtml -o coverage/report coverage.lcov
tasks.release: deno run -A npm:commit-and-tag-version && git push --follow-tags origin main && deno publish --allow-slow-types
